org.nasdanika.common.persistence

Class FunctionAttribute<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nasdanika.common.persistence.Attribute<T>
      • org.nasdanika.common.persistence.FunctionAttribute<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feature<T>, Marked, ObjectFactory<T>

    public class FunctionAttribute<T>
extends Attribute<T>
    Applies a function to the config value to produce feature value.
    Author:
    Pavel

      • create

        public T create(ObjectLoader loader,
                Object config,
                URL base,
                ProgressMonitor progressMonitor,
                Marker marker)
         throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Attribute
        This implementation casts config to the target type. It can be used where not special conversion is required, e.g. config is a String and feature type is String.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ObjectFactory<T>
        Overrides:
        create in class Attribute<T>
        base - Base URL for resolving references.
        marker - Optional source marker for troubleshooting.
        Returns:
        Created object
        Throws:
        Exception
